## Summary
Provide a concise description of the change and link the related `openspec` change under `openspec/changes/`.

## Checklist
- [ ] Spec updated (`openspec/changes/<change>/proposal.md`)
- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] Evidence file added to `aureus-openclaw-platform/docs/evidence/` (week-XX.md)
- [ ] Threat model updated (if relevant)
- [ ] Key management notes included (if signing keys involved)

## Evidence
Add links to CI run logs, schema-lint output, and any test artifacts.

## Notes
Any deployment or operational steps reviewers should run.
